intro: A Front-End Engineer and beginner writer
skillSummary: Hi! I'm a Frontend Engineer with a strong background in modern Frontend libraries and frameworks such as React.js, Next.js, Vue.js, and Bootstrap. I specialize in building high-performance web applications using HTML, CSS, JavaScript, and TypeScript, and have 3 years of experience in this field.

Currently working as a Frontend Engineer at data.ai, I develop innovative data analysis web reports and handle data integration and functionality testing. My hard-working nature, along with an innovative mindset, helps me tackle complex challenges and come up with fresh solutions.
With a strong work ethic, I am dedicated to ensuring the success of any project or task I undertake. I am always willing to go the extra mile and take pride in delivering exceptional results.
